parsed_email.subject: RES: Pelagia Voy.02 // Paranagua for loading
parsed_email.sender: Fertimport Sao Francisco do Sul – Ops <OPERATIONS-SFS@fertimport.com.br>
parsed_email.body_text:
Message: 8454902
From: Fertimport Sao Francisco do Sul – Ops <OPERATIONS-SFS@fertimport.com.br>
To: "pelagia@vessels.astraship.com" <pelagia@vessels.astraship.com>
Cc: 'Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc' <ops@astraship.com>,"Fertimport Paranagua – Ops" <operations-pgua@fertimport.com.br>
Date: Fri, 09/Jan/2026 15:24:44 (UTC: +02:00)
Subject: RES: Pelagia Voy.02 // Paranagua for loading

Dear Captain,


Good Day,

 

We would like to inform that sludge/oily water/wash water/sewage/garbage disposal is free of charge over 10 m3.

 

Regarding Garbage removal is Compulsory at Paranagua, However, we shall program removal minimum quantity 200 kg for Chareteres account,

for extra Kg, must be settle by Owners account.

 

Minimum quantity - 200 Kg: 600 USD (Covered in PDA)

For extra kilogram above the minimum quantity - 200 Kg: 1,70 USD per extra Kg (By Master/Owner account).

 

 

 

Best regards,

 

 

 

Walber Cozer de Pina 

 

Operations

 

Phone: +55 41 99207 4872

(If unavailable, follow the contact number: +55 41 99207-9480 - Mr. Rodrigo Souza (Ops coordinator).

 

operations-pgua@fertimport.com.br

operations-sfs@fertimport.com.br

 

 

 

 

 

De: pelagia@vessels.astraship.com <pelagia@vessels.astraship.com>
Enviada em: sexta-feira, 9 de janeiro de 2026 09:50
Para: Fertimport Paranagua – Ops <operations-pgua@fertimport.com.br>; Fertimport Sao Francisco do Sul – Ops <OPERATIONS-SFS@fertimport.com.br>
Cc: 'Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc' <ops@astraship.com>
Assunto: RE: Pelagia Voy.02 // Paranagua for loading

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of Bunge. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender !

 

To: FERTIMPORT

Cc: As Addressed

Fm: Master – Pelagia

 

Dear Mr. Walber,

 

Good day!

 

Kindly advise as per below message from my owners.

 

Thank you and best regards,

 

Capt. Benjo Austin C. Dejelo

Master of MV PELAGIA

email: pelagia@vessels.astraship.com

Tel: +870773065896 [FBB]

GR DID: +30 2100220258

Telex: 424985110

 

From: Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com>
Sent: 08 January 2026 12:30
To: operations-sfs@fertimport.com.br
Cc: operations-pgua@fertimport.com.br; pelagia@vessels.astraship.com
Subject: Pelagia Voy.02 // Paranagua for loading

 

Message Number: 767764

From: ops@astraship.com

To: operations-sfs@fertimport.com.br

Cc: operations-pgua@fertimport.com.br, PELAGIA (pelagia@vessels.astraship.com)

Sent: Thursday, Jan 8, 2026 14:30 (UTC +02:00)

Subject: Pelagia Voy.02 // Paranagua for loading

 

Dear Sirs, 

 

Good Day.

 

Kindly advise availability of reception facilities for sludge/oily water/wash water/sewage/garbage, cost per cbm or ton and procedures for ordering such operation.

Please advise if any disposal is compulsory. In addition to this, kindly advise whether the providers are ISO14001 approved.

 

Awaiting yours.

 

Best Regards,
Dimitra Ioannidou
Operations Dept.

Astra Shipmanagement Inc
(as agents only)
6 Vouliagmenis Avenue & 12 Nirvana St.
Voula, 166 73
Athens - Greece
Tel: +30 213 0175 106

Prioritizing the wellbeing of our planet and its people.

 

This email may contain confidential and privileged information. Use or disclosure of it by anyone other than an intended recipient is prohibited.
If you received this email in error, please notify the sender immediately by return email and destroy all copies of this email.

 

*Please consider the environment before printing*


This message is intended only for the named recipient and may contain confidential, proprietary or legally privileged information.
No confidentiality or privilege is waived or lost by any misdirected transmission.
If you received this message in error, please notify us immediately by telephone at +1 314 292-2000 and immediately delete this message from your system.
If you are not the intended recipient, you must not use, disclose, distribute or copy any part of this message.
